Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-29499 affecting package glib for versions less than 2.71.0-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-29499 affecting package glib for versions less than 2.71.0-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package glib is earlier than 2.71.0-4, affected by CVE-2023-29499
